item.title: [PaperNotes]2019.Mobile Edge Computing, Blockchain and Reputation-based Crowdsourcing IoT Federated Learning A Secure Decentralized and Privacy-preserving System
item.description: 2019.Mobile Edge Computing, Blockchain and Reputation-based Crowdsourcing IoT Federated Learning A Secure Decentralized and Privacy-preserving System 本文总结原文为《Mobile Edge Computing, Blockchain and Reputation-based Crowdsourcing IoT Federated Learning A Secure Decentralized and Privacy-preserving System》Yang Zhao et al。笔记主要供自己复看复
